name: Mummy Mayhem
description:
DESCRIPTION

Mummy Mayhem is a short platforming game made for the 32bit jam 2022 game jam. It was created in roughly two weeks and attempts to emulate the N64 in visuals and design.

Traverse 8 stages and reach the end to win! Each stage has an optional golden scarab you can collect.

CONTROLS

CAMERAMOUSE MOVEMENTRUNWASDJUMPSPACEBARFIRST PERSONRIGHTCLICK

Feel free to tweet me your best run times or comment : @MothInteractive
